name: Tense Reflection
description:
Tense Reflection is an innovative puzzle / shooter where you need to solve puzzles in order to reload your ammo / change the color of your shots.

In order to win, you must quickly switch between 3 panels :




In Tense Reflection, you will never be able to slow down. Keep going, stay focus, and good luck.



The game features a colorblind mode.







Tense Reflection features musics from the 7 following artists :
